channel.title: Fallback Position by John E. Arnold
channel.itunes:subtitle: Fallback Position - Surviving the 21st Century Workplace
channel.itunes:summary: John E. Arnold discusses business and economic trends, uncertainty in the global economy, how to survive in the 21st Century workplace.
channel.description: John E. Arnold discusses business and economic trends, uncertainty in the global economy, how to survive in the 21st Century workplace.
channel.itunes:author: John E. Arnold

item.title: Fallback Position Book Summary
item.description: The days of 50 years on the job and a gold watch are long gone. John E. Arnold summarizes his book Fallback Position and explains the keys how you can survive in the 21st century workplace. See more at www.FallbackPositionBook.com
item.itunes:author: John E. Arnold
item.itunes:subtitle: John E. Arnold summarizes his book Fallback Position and explains the keys how you can survive in the 21st century workplace.
item.itunes:summary: The days of 50 years on the job and a gold watch are long gone. John E. Arnold summarizes his book Fallback Position and explains the keys how you can survive in the 21st century workplace. See more at www.FallbackPositionBook.com
item.itunes:keywords: laid off, fired, job hunt, job negotiation, outsourcing, fallback position, audiobook

item.title: New Jobs, New Careers
item.description: After losing a job, your natural reaction is to quickly get a job with a similar company in the same field. John talks about jobs and careers that are growing, and potentially protected from outsourcing. See more at www.FallbackPositionBook.com
item.itunes:author: John E. Arnold
item.itunes:subtitle: John talks about jobs and careers that are growing, and potentially protected from outsourcing.
